actions.committee: Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to establish the Sacramento River National Recreation Area in the State of California.
short_title: Sacramento River National Recreation Area Act of 2007

summary.text: Sacramento River National Recreation Area Act of 2007 - Establishes the Sacramento River National Recreation Area in California, consisting of specified public land in Tehama and Shasta Counties. Requires the development of a comprehensive plan for the long-range protection and management of such Area.

titles.title: Sacramento River National Recreation Area Act of 2007
A bill to establish the Sacramento River National Recreation Area in the State of California.
